full_text.0: @kthalps @elonmusk I'm hoping the Universe gave Zuckerberg & Musk obscene amounts of cash so they can destroy social media for humanity, and we all start looking each other in the eyes and have civil discourse. Maybe even call our moms.
full_text.1:
@SAVoltolin We're watching, I pray, the demise of social media. Maybe this is why the Universe gave these two megalomaniacs (Musk & Zuckerberg) so much cash—so they can destroy social media for all of humanity, and we will all start talking with civility to each other again. 

I can pray.
